mapper.insert: insert into t_employee (id, user_id, company_id, dept_id, create_time, employee_code, employee_position, entry_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{employeeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeePosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update t_employee set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, employee_code = #{employeeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, employee_position = #{employeePosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, entry_time = #{entryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, company_id, dept_id, create_time, employee_code, employee_position, entry_time from t_employee where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
